Work experience bursary scheme (WEB)

Contents

  1. About the scheme
  2. Who can apply?
  3. How to apply

Who can apply?

All currently enrolled University of Warwick students who study an undergraduate or postgraduate course while undertaking the work experience can apply. Students that are temporarily withdrawn from their studies at the University cannot apply.

Finalists may only apply for bursaries that cover the period up to the end of the month in which their course finishes (June or November as applicable) and must submit their Bursary Release Request form by the end of that month, as payments beyond this point are not possible via the Student Finance and Student Funding offices.

  • Previous : About the scheme
  • Next : How to apply
